invoke(reader, parser) - Method in interface com.github.mibac138.argparser.binder.Binding
Calls the underlying method using output from parser. In case parser returned a error (as a collection/map/array element) it gets added to exceptions from where you can retrieve it. Note: This method might throw an exception if one of parser's results is a exception
invoke(reader, parser) - Method in class com.github.mibac138.argparser.binder.BindingImpl
Calls the underlying method using output from parser. In case parser returned a error (as a collection/map/array element) it gets added to exceptions from where you can retrieve it. Note: This method might throw an exception if one of parser's results is a exception
